mean.label: Mean
mean.calculate: (input1 + input2 + input3 + input4 + input5 + input6 + input7 + input8 + input9 + input10) / 10

median.label: Median
median.calculate: let sorted = [input1, input2, input3, input4, input5, input6, input7, input8, input9, input10].sort(); if (sorted.length % 2 === 0) { (sorted[sorted.length / 2 - 1] + sorted[sorted.length / 2]) / 2 } else { sorted[Math.floor(sorted.length / 2)] }

standardDeviation.label: Standard Deviation
standardDeviation.calculate: let mean = (input1 + input2 + input3 + input4 + input5 + input6 + input7 + input8 + input9 + input10) / 10; let variance = ((input1 - mean) ** 2 + (input2 - mean) ** 2 + (input3 - mean) ** 2 + (input4 - mean) ** 2 + (input5 - mean) ** 2 + (input6 - mean) ** 2 + (input7 - mean) ** 2 + (input8 - mean) ** 2 + (input9 - mean) ** 2 + (input10 - mean) ** 2) / 10; Math.sqrt(variance)
